P3212.ANFBackend.DAOs

Interface DAOUserInFightInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserInFightJDBCImplementation

    public interface DAOUserInFightInterface
    CRUD interface for Fighting-related information Uses a mapper - implementation of a RowMapper<> interface for ORM purpose
